name: ZhuZhu Babies
overview: Another ZhuZhu Adventure is about to begin! The babies have wandered off during a trip around the world and they need your help to get back home! Features • Travel across over 35 levels of twists and turns! • 11 new ZhuZhu Babies, each with a unique personality, just try to keep up! • Disguise your babies with new dress up options to help conceal your identity! • Race through airports, bus stations and popular tourist destinations to make it back!
